sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../_services/auth.service'; import { StorageService } from '../_services/storage.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { form: any = { username: null, password: null }; isLoggedIn = false; isLoginFailed = false; errorMessage = ''; roles: string[] = []; constructor(private authService: AuthService, private storageService: StorageService) { } ngOnInit(): void { if (this.storageService.isLoggedIn()) { this.isLoggedIn = true; this.roles = this.storageService.getUser().roles; } } onSubmit(): void { const { username, password } = this.form; this.authService.login(username, password).subscribe({ next: data => { this.storageService.saveUser(data); this.isLoginFailed = false; this.isLoggedIn = true; this.roles = this.storageService.getUser().roles; this.reloadPage(); }, error: err => { this.errorMessage = err.error.message; this.isLoginFailed = true; } }); } reloadPage(): void { window.location.reload(); } }
